text:
Hiya! I'm having some weird issues with a blog archive page. It's sorting blog posts per month (published date), and I'm accessing it via this URL: ```{{ group.absolute_url }}/archive/{{ month }}```
In most cases it works just as expected.. But for certain months, only 1 post is shown, even though there are multiple posts published during that time.

Any ideas on what might be wrong? It's using the regular blog listing template.
